Package ProblemGenerators

Class StringClauseSetGenerator

java.lang.Object
ProblemGenerators.ProblemGenerator
ProblemGenerators.StringClauseSetGenerator
public final class StringClauseSetGenerator extends Generator
Created by ohlbach on 27.08.2018. This generator creates a clause set from literal names. This is basically for test purposes.

    • parseInterval

      private static int[] parseInterval(String line, int id, Symboltable symboltable, String errorPrefix, StringBuilder errors)
      parses a line with an interval quantifier. Only syntactic checks are done. Semantic checks are done in BasicClauseList
      Parameters:
      line - the line to be parsed
      id - the identifier for the new clause
      symboltable - a symboltable
      errors - for appending error messages
      Returns:
      the parse clause

    • parseLiterals

      private static boolean parseLiterals(String[] parts, int startPart, int[] basicClause, int positionBC, Symboltable symboltable, String errorPrefix, StringBuilder errors)
      parses the literal-part of a clause line
      Parameters:
      parts - the clause-line, split by , or blank
      startPart - where the literals start
      basicClause - where to put the parsed literals into
      positionBC - start index of the basicClause
      symboltable - a symboltable
      errorPrefix - for errors
      errors - for appending errors
      Returns:
      true if the parsing was successful
